text: geudaeneun geudeul-i jinsillo geu nugubodado, usangsungbaejabodado deo, (hyeonse-ui) salm-eul yeolmangham-eul balgyeonhal geos-ila. geudeul jung-ui eotteon ineun cheonnyeon-eul salge doeeoss-eumyeon hago galmanghana (geuleohge olae) saneun geos-i geuleul beollobuteo guhaejuneun geos-i anila. hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-i haenghaneun geos-eul bogo gyesineun bun-ila
